name: Kkremitzki
description: The fearless organizer who keeps the club running like a finely tuned script.

name: Edward
description: Resident comedic relief — cracks jokes faster than a for-loop on caffeine. Still doesn't believe in Await though.

name: Daryk
description: The developer who still thinks JavaScript is out to get him. Debugging his way through life.

name: Brian
description: No one really knows what Brian does, but it wouldn't be the same without him.

name: Zoe
description: Security guru. Can hack your Wi-Fi just by looking at it. Paranoid, but in a lovable way.

name: Max
description: Hardware tinkerer who insists that everything is better with LEDs — including the coffee maker.

name: Ivy
description: Loves automation so much she tried to automate snack ordering. Accidentally bought 400 bags of chips.

name: Samir
description: Master of obscure Linux distros. Installed Gentoo on a toaster. Twice.

name: Alina
description: Pixel-perfect designer with a vendetta against Comic Sans and unaligned divs.

name: Marcus
description: AI enthusiast. Still thinks Clippy had potential. Talks to ChatGPT like it’s a roommate.

name: Jess
description: Writes documentation so good, it makes grown devs cry. Actually enjoys markdown.

name: Toby
description: Club's chaos agent. Always has 'just one quick idea' that turns into a week-long project.

name: Lena
description: Backend wizard. Speaks fluent SQL, curses at ORMs, and laughs in schema validation.

name: Raj
description: DevOps demigod. Has a terminal open in every tab and can summon Kubernetes from memory.

name: Nina
description: Front-end perfectionist. Once filed a bug report because a pixel was off. She was right.

name: Kai
description: The quiet one. Only speaks when there’s a syntax error — and it’s always right.

name: Victor
description: Game dev obsessed with shaders and particles. Made a simulation of the club in Unity. It crashed.

name: Ella
description: Digital artist and meme archivist. Responsible for 90% of the club's inside jokes.

name: Tomoko
description: Database whisperer. Knows exactly where every lost table went. Probably hiding behind a left join.

name: Leo
description: Brings donuts. Also knows C++. But mostly brings donuts.
